snippet: The growth of DigitalOcean enticed the venture capital firm Andreessen Horowitz to lead a $37.2 million financing round, a rare instance when it has invested “outside the Valley.”
abstract: The growth of DigitalOcean enticed the venture capital firm Andreessen Horowitz to lead a $37.2 million financing round, a rare instance when it has invested “outside the Valley.”

headline.main: Andreessen Horowitz Backs DigitalOcean, a Cloud Computing Start-Up
